title: Take me off low prioirty queue
body:
I was just playing a ranked 5v5 game as zyra and my game kept bugsplatting every time I got into the game. About 5 times in, I realized that it happened every time I went to upgrade an ability and put my cursor over the [+] button. I joined the game again and played for a few minutes, but by this time, the game was over and we lost. I got placed in a 5 game, 10 minute low priority queue. I started playing aram just incase it happened again and it did. However, I realized I could upgrade my abilities just fine by using [ctr] Q (W,E,R).

This is obviously not my fault. I sent bugsplat reports and everything. I think it is really unfair to put me in a low prio queue. Is there any way I can get out of it?

replies.body:
I'm not sure what the issue is, but I'm assuming that your keys were not responding when trying to use them.  I know it wasn't your fault but we aren't able to remove [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalties.  The system treats all leaves equally and regardless of intent because leaving still causes negative experiences.  It sounds like your config is corrupt, so resetting should fix it up.

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Make sure to test it in a custom match to prevent any penalties.  I hope that helps!
